spec_data.Name: ghc-gtk3
spec_data.Description:
This is the core library of the Gtk2Hs suite of libraries for Haskell based on
Gtk+. Gtk+ is an extensive and mature multi-platform toolkit for creating
graphical user interfaces.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Wed 16 Aug 2017 08:59:57 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Binding to the Gtk+ 3 graphical user interface library
